result.html: níl ach dhá rogha againnWe only have two options.
result.ponchtml: níl aċ ḋá roġa againnWe only have two options.

result.eng: You have a choice to make.
result.ga: tá rogha le déanamh agat
result.html: tá rogha le déanamh agatYou have a choice to make.
result.ponchtml: tá roġa le déanaṁ agatYou have a choice to make.

result.eng: When I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ga: nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
result.orig: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
